competitors.name: Google (Alphabet Inc.)
competitors.notes: G Suite vs Office 365, Google Cloud vs Azure, Android dominance

competitors.name: Apple Inc.
competitors.notes: iPhone competed with Windows Phone through 2015

competitors.name: Amazon (AWS)
competitors.notes: AWS competing with Microsoft Azure in cloud computing

competitors.name: IBM

competitors.name: Oracle

context: Transitional period as Microsoft pivoted to cloud under Satya Nadella. Windows Phone era ending. Competition in cloud infrastructure (Azure vs AWS vs Google Cloud) intensified.
